```{r output=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Data for a simple linear regression

```{r}
n <- 20
beta <- c(b0 = 1,
          b1 = 0.5)
mu <- function(x) beta[1] + beta[2]*x
dat <- tibble(x = rep(1:5, length.out=n),
              y = rnorm(n, mean = mu(x), sd = 1)
              )
```

## Plot

```{r}
ggplot(dat, aes(x,y)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method="lm")
```
